name: Zookeeper Cloud Discovery
shortDescription: The Hazelcast Zookeeper Discovery plugin provides a service-based discovery strategy by using Apache Curator for communicating your Zookeeper server for Hazelcast 3.6.1+ Discovery SPI enabled applications
longDescription: The Hazelcast Zookeeper Discovery plugin provides a service-based discovery strategy by using Apache Curator for communicating your Zookeeper server for Hazelcast 3.6.1+ Discovery SPI enabled applications.
